original_title: The Favour, the Watch and the Very Big Fish
overview: A farce, Hoskins plays a photographer who specializes in religious pictures who searches for a model for Jesus. He does a favor for a friend and finds himself doing a voice track for a porno movie with Natasha Richardson. Hoskins finds his model for Jesus in Jeff Goldblum and a romantic triangle begins in which Goldblum finds adoring crowds believing him to be Jesus and then begins to believe it himself.
tagline: The catch of the day is fresh comedy.
title: The Favour, the Watch and the Very Big Fish
